Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.Entity2DContainer
      • com.xebisco.yield.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behavior, Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlankScene, Main
    public abstract class Scene
extends Entity2DContainer
implements Behavior
    The Scene class is an abstract class that extends Entity2DContainer and implements Behavior, and contains various systems and properties for managing a scene.
